ygData.subject: Re: [warrior_eq]  Charisma necklaces spoiler
ygData.msgSnippet: In the future please mark *spoiler* before you give out the information for these lore items.  Some people just don t want to know where to get these things :)
ygData.messageBody:
In the future please mark *spoiler* before you give out the information
for these lore items. Some people just don't want to know where to
get these things :)

Now to answer your question about Drosco.

Warning *spoiler*.....scroll down to find out what quest Drosco is
connected to.


























Seems like ol' Drosco was a member of the Bloodsabers
(the group in the sewers that worships Bertox). One of the
NPCs in the Shrine of Bertox in the sewers will tell you that
Drosco has been leading the guards to the Shrine and that
he must be killed. I believe you return the letter or the
amulet to the NPC to solve the quest. Note that this will
only work for evil aligned characters. If you are good, you
will have NO chance to make it to the Shrine.


> ----------
> From: mark mark[SMTP:markerob@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Wednesday, June 09, 1999 2:14 PM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] [warrior_eq] Charisma necklaces spoiler
>
> From: mark mark <markerob@...>
>
> I don't know if everyone knows about this but I'll post it just in case.
>
> Drosco in the Qeynos aquiducts has a +5 to char medal on him,and he is an
> easy kill. Prob lev 8 or so. It is a lore item though, so you will not be
> able to get more than one. It is better to enter the sewers in the pool
> near
> the qeynos bank, that is closer to his spawn.
>
> There is also a nesting rat down there that has a gold necklace +3 to
> charisma. I don't know what quest it is related to, but it is not a lore
> item so you could prob get more than one (not sure), anyway the rat is a
> very easy kill. Prob lev 4-6. If anyone knows what quest this is for
> send
> me a post, curious.....
>
> Just for everyones information.....
>
> Arathorne, Warrior of Clan Dolald
> Solsek Ro
>
